# Welcome to the WHO Lab!

## About the lab
Welcome to the lab of Dr. Xindi (Cindy) Hu, Assistant Professor in Epidemiology & Population Health at Stanford University. Our mission is to XXX. Our focus is on XXX. We use a variety of XXX methods in pursuit of our mission. To learn more about the lab, visit [xindicindyhu.org](https://xindicindyhu.org/).

## About this lab manual
This lab manual covers our communication strategy, code of conduct, and best practices for reproducibility of computational workflows. It is a living document that is updated regularly. 

This manual was created with input from a large number of team members and with inspiration from [other scientists' lab manuals](https://jadebc.github.io/lab-manual/). 
Contributors include Xindi (Cindy) Hu, Jahred Liddie.

Feel free to draw from this manual (and please cite it if you do!).
